subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Former Yankee Bobby Abreu aided his old team with an error in the fourth, and Melky Cabrera, who followed Abreu into the No. 53 jersey, broke a tie in the eighth.
snippet: Former Yankee Bobby Abreu aided his old team with an error in the fourth, and Melky Cabrera, who followed Abreu into the No. 53 jersey, broke a tie in the eighth.
